content:
path /v3/nft/address/balance/chain/address
operationId NftGetTokensByAddressErc721
parameters
description The blockchain to work with
in path
name chain
required True
schema
type string
description The blockchain address that you want to get the token balance of
in path
name address
required True
schema
type string
summary Get NFT balance of the wallet
description 1 credit per API call  5 credits for each owned NFT
Get all NFTs that a blockchain address holds The NFTs are returned grouped by the smart contracts they were minted on
This API is supported for the following blockchains

Algorand
BNB Smart Chain  mainnet only
Celo
Ethereum
Polygon
Solana

On Solana and Algorand if a blockchain address holds fewer than 50 NFTs the API also returns each NFTs metadata If the metadata is not returned you can obtain it using the API for getting NFT metadata
responses
200
schema
type array
NftTokenByAddressErc721
type object
required
contractAddress
balances
metadata
properties
contractAddress
type string
description On Algorand this is the asset ID the ID of the NFT on the other blockchains this is the address of the NFT smart contract
balances
type array
description On Algorand this is either an array of 1 to indicate that the NFTs with the specified IDs exist or an array with the number of NFT fractions if the NFTs are fractional on the other blockchains this is an array of the IDs of the NFTs
items
type string
maxLength 78
format uint256
blockNumber
type number
description EVMbased blockchains only An array of the numbers of the blocks in which the NFT was received by the address
metadata
type array
NftTokenByAddressErc721TokenMetadata
type object
properties
tokenId
description EVMbased blockchains only The ID of the NFT owned by this address
type string
maxLength 78
format uint256
url
description The URL pointing to the NFT metadata the URL may not be present and if it is not returned you can get it by calling the NFT ContracttokenURI method
type string
NftTokenByAddressErc721Metadata
type object
description The metadata scheme obtained from the metadata URL the scheme may not be present and if it is not returned you can get it using the NFT metadata API
supply
type number
description Algorand only The number of fractions in the NFT if the NFT is fractional
decimals
type number
description Algorand only The number of decimal places in an NFT fraction if the NFT is fractional
description OK
